name: equcomd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
-| wb(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
-| wb(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))

comment: Deduction form of ~ equcom , symmetry of equality. For the versions for classes, see ~ eqcom and ~ eqcomd . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.)
